title: The First Battle of Morn
description: Torin, a member of the ruling class of the planet Morn, flees from all he has known to save both himself and his flying horse, Saba. Thrown into a planetary revolution, of which he is the key, Torin realizes not only that the final battle lies within him, but also that the definition of humanity is far broader than anything he had previously believed.
author: Deborah Moulton
